member.name: IP_OPTION_INFORMATION
member.summary: TheIP_OPTION_INFORMATION structure describes the options to be included in the header of an IP packet.

member.name: IP_OPTION_INFORMATION.Ttl
member.summary: The Time to Live field in an IPv4 packet header. This is the Hop Limit field in an IPv6 header.

member.name: IP_OPTION_INFORMATION.Tos
member.summary: The type of service field in an IPv4 header. This member is currently silently ignored.

summary.para: The Flags field. In IPv4, this is the Flags field in the IPv4 header. In IPv6, this field is represented by options headers.

listheader.description: This value causes the IP packet to add in an IP routing header with the source. This value is only applicable on Windows Vista and later.
This value indicates that the packet should not be fragmented.

member.name: IP_OPTION_INFORMATION.OptionsSize
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of IP options data.
